Class Player

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.entities.Entity
gamePackages.entities.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player entity in the game, extending the base `Entity` class. The `Player` class introduces additional attributes and behaviors specific to the player, such as inventory management, dodge mechanics, and screen-related parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String spritePath, float posX, float posY, int width, int height, float maxHealth)
      Constructs a `Player` object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      spritePath - The path to the sprite sheet for the player.
      posX - The X-coordinate of the player's position.
      posY - The Y-coordinate of the player's position.
      width - The width of the player.
      height - The height of the player.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the player. This constructor initializes the player's animations, collision properties, inventory, and screen-related attributes. It also sets default values for dodge mechanics and movement speed.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerInventory

      public Inventory getPlayerInventory()
      Gets the player's inventory.
      Returns:
      The player's inventory object.

    • isDodgeState

      public boolean isDodgeState()
      Checks if the player is in a dodge state.
      Returns:
      True if the player is dodging, false otherwise.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition(List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> walls)
      Updates the player's position, resolving collisions with walls.
      Parameters:
      walls - A list of rectangles representing wall positions in the game world.

    • dodge

      public void dodge(float delta)
      Initiates a dodge action for the player, temporarily increasing speed.
      Parameters:
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for timing the dodge.

    • addEffect

      public void addEffect(ConsumableItem item)
      Adds an effect to the player's active effects list.
      Parameters:
      item - The consumable item representing the effect.

    • getListOfEffect

      public HashMap<String,ConsumableItem> getListOfEffect()
      Gets the player's list of active effects.
      Returns:
      A map of effect names to consumable items currently affecting the player.

    • updateEffects

      public void updateEffects(float delta)
      Updates the player's active effects, removing expired effects and reversing their impact.
      Parameters:
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for timing effect durations.

    • playerRender

      public void playerRender(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, float delta)
      Renders the player, including animations for movement, attacks, and dodging.
      Parameters:
      batch - The SpriteBatch used to draw the player.
      delta - Time elapsed since the last frame, used for animation timing.

    • updateLoadingRectangle

      public void updateLoadingRectangle()
      Updates the player's loading rectangle to reflect its current position on the screen.

    • getLoadingRectangle

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getLoadingRectangle()
      Gets the loading rectangle of the player.
      Returns:
      The loading rectangle, defining the visible area around the player.

    • setOldMaxHP

      public void setOldMaxHP(float maxHP)
      Sets the player's previous maximum health.
      Parameters:
      maxHP - The value to set as the player's old maximum health.

    • setOldSpeed

      public void setOldSpeed(float speed)
      Sets the player's previous speed.
      Parameters:
      speed - The value to set as the player's old speed.

    • getOldSpeed

      public float getOldSpeed()
      Gets the player's previous speed.
      Returns:
      The player's old speed value.

    • getOldMaxHP

      public float getOldMaxHP()
      Gets the player's previous maximum health.
      Returns:
      The player's old maximum health value.

    • setPlayerInventory

      public void setPlayerInventory(Inventory inventory)
      Sets the player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory to set for the player.

    • setOldHP

      public void setOldHP(float hp)
      Sets the player's previous health.
      Parameters:
      hp - The value to set as the player's old health.

    • getOldHP

      public float getOldHP()
      Gets the player's previous health.
      Returns:
      The player's old health value.

    • deepCopy

      public Player deepCopy()
      Creates a deep copy of the player, including inventory and active effects.
      Returns:
      A new `Player` object with identical properties and effects.
